interests.name: programming
interests.description: For me, programming is not just a career but also a hobby. I have fun making things through code.

interests.name: music
interests.description: I played piano since I was young and I regularly play as part of a band. I also like playing guitar.

interests.name: photography
interests.description: I enjoy taking photos of scenery, nature, and food. Sometimes I use Photoshop to edit them.

interests.name: travelling
interests.description: I like travelling and visiting new places around the world. So far, Prague was my favourite.
